plot: Jeremy is down and out. He seriously doesn't care if he lives or dies. Will he fall deeper into his feelings or see the light?
title: Remembering
plot_es: Jeremy is down and out. He seriously doesn't care if he lives or dies. Will he fall deeper into his feelings or see the light?
plot_en: Jeremy is down and out. He seriously doesn't care if he lives or dies. Will he fall deeper into his feelings or see the light?
